TopicTitle: Game always crashes when returning to space centre

Articles.Content:
Hi i'm finding the game always crashes when i return to the space centre when using x86 and 64 versions of the game in windows and when i play the game in OSX. KSP has been particularly bad when i try playing in OSX especially with mods in the game. I've tried pasting the output log here from the windows crash but couldn't as there is too many characters within the crash log. Help greatly appreciated.

Thanks Michelle
